name: Bota Pra Quebrar
description:
Bota Pra Quebrar is a game about representing social tribes in a dispute over the presidency of the Tropical Country. Using spells based on their personalities, players should be the last to remain at Arena Tropicália.

Controls: A W S D (move)

Left click (attack)

Need minimum two players to start!!!!

This is our first version, help us with feedback!!
